channel.title: Elastic Compute Cloud on AWS Basics
channel.description: Recent content in Elastic Compute Cloud on AWS Basics

item.title: Walkthrough
item.description: The following walkthrough content for the AWS EC2 service will take you through these steps: Creating your first AWS EC2 Instance Accessing / Connecting to the Instance Deploying Static Websites React Angular Deploying MVC Applications using a Reverse Proxy. Java/Spring C#/ASP.NET Content Links First EC2 Instance Access your EC2 Static Websites Reverse Proxy
